byline.contributor: Andrew Roth contributed reporting from Moscow.

abstract: German Foreign Min Frank-Walter Steinmeier, after meeting with counterparts from France, Russia and Ukraine, says rival sides in eastern Ukraine should remove heavy weapons to comply with cease-fire.
lead_paragraph: In talks to try to shore up the fragile truce, Germany, France, Ukraine and Russia agreed that both sides should pull back tanks and artillery.

headline.main: Rival Factions in Ukraine Are Urged to Withdraw Heavy Weapons
headline.print_headline: Rival Sides in Ukraine Are Urged to Remove Heavy Weapons

snippet: In talks to try to shore up the fragile truce, Germany, France, Ukraine and Russia agreed that both sides should pull back tanks and artillery.
